Title: Establishes a bipartisan committee to investigate and make recommendations as to whether Governor Andrew Cuomo committed acts for which impeachment is warranted
Summary: Establishes a bipartisan committee to investigate and make recommendations as to whether Governor Andrew Cuomo committed acts for which impeachment is warranted with respect to certain actions relating to the admission of COVID-19 patients to nursing homes.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a bipartisan committee to investigate and make recommendations as to whether Governor Andrew Cuomo committed acts for which impeachment is warranted with respect to certain actions relating to the admission of COVID-19 patients to nursing homes; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
